body: @johnsmith-909-2 Indeed. Much of the Japanese doujin/hentai/pixiv communities are slowly increasing in NTR contents more and more. NTR will soon take its place among the other well known fetishes, if it hadn't already.
Everyone should know by know the kind of shit that mil writes, he never changes.  No one should be complaining or surprised.  If you don't like this kind of thing, don't read his shit.
I keep forgetting about fat old guys fucking young girls in Netorare.

One should always remember that in a respectable netorare genre the main character is actually the bald 50 year old fat guys, not the pretty boys who hit puberty. To put it simply the genre are aimed towards a wider range of audience who might be fat old people who has a fantasy about young girls.
Gotta admit, this one is pretty boring. Where has the big oppai magic of Mil went? :[
